name: Pagea's Drop a letter #1 Online Trivia | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Just drop one letter each time and scramble to find the new answer. The first answer is seven letters and once you reach question 6 (two letters) start going up again.

Understood a topic.
One who is short of breath.
A small round fruit, usually found in bunches.
One of many that would be found in a book.

And now start adding letters.

A more modern music style.

questions.explanation:
diaper.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz!
